description:
Gintoki and the others rush to Number 502, who plans to take control of Edo with machines. They head to the terminal in Gengai`s tank. Gengai and the tank are lost in an attack by a giant maid. Gintoki parts ways with Kagura and Sadaharu, and heads further in with Fuyo. Gintoki and Fuyo finally confront 502. 502 tries to welcome Fuyo as a reincarnation of his daughter, but Fuyo refuses. Obeying the words of late Professor Hayashi to give his daughter a smile, she tries to destroy 502, who has gone out of control!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Manche Daten kann man einfach nicht löschen!
There Is Data That Cannot Be Deleted
消せないデータもある
